overview: In an isolated farm amidst the French Alps, Jean-Philippe Valla, a farmer-electronic engineer develops energy and food self-sufficiency techniques. Julie Desprairies, a site-specific choreographer, joins in order to practice in this extraordinary place with dancers and musicians. Farming gestures and dance gestures merge as the agricultural and the choreography works seek together a fairer way to inhabit the world. Director Vladimir LÃ©on returns to Doclisboa after presenting his previous film, Mes chers espions, in the 2020 edition.
title: Your Bare Legs
